mapper.select: SELECT d.file_tag , d.file_name , d.file_desc , d.file_size , d.document_no , d.extenstion , d.file_reg_date , d.update_user , e.user_id FROM document d LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON d.user_no = e.user_no LEFT JOIN team t ON e.team_no = t.team_no

SELECT h.file_name, h.down_user, e.user_name, e.user_id, h.download_date, h.document_no, h.download_user_ip, d.file_tag FROM download_history h JOIN document d ON h.document_no = d.document_no JOIN employee e ON h.down_user = e.user_no WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRUNC(h.download_date) = #{downloadDate}
AND h.file_name LIKE '%' || #{fileName} || '%'
AND e.user_name LIKE '%' || #{userName} || '%'
SELECT document_no, file_name, file_desc, file_size, attachment, extenstion, file_reg_date, file_tag, user_no, update_user FROM document WHERE document_no = #{documentNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO document ( DOCUMENT_NO , FILE_NAME , FILE_DESC , FILE_SIZE , ATTACHMENT , EXTENSTION , FILE_REG_DATE , FILE_TAG , UPDATE_USER
) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(DOCUMENT_NO), 0) + 1 FROM document), #{fileName}, #{fileDesc}, #{fileSize}, #{attachment}, #{extenstion}, SYSDATE, #{fileTag}, #{userNo} )

INSERT INTO download_history ( download_no , file_name , down_user , download_date , document_no , download_user_ip
) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(download_no), 0) + 1 FROM download_history), #{fileName}, #{downUser}, SYSDATE, #{documentNo}, #{downloadUserIp} )
